meanings.definition: A movie or other work of fiction characterized by an abundance of graphic violence and gore.
meanings.sent1: The horror film was a gorefest with blood and guts everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The gorefest movie left the audience shocked and scared.
meanings.sent3: The gorefest on screen was so over-the-top, it made me jump in my seat.
meanings.sent4: Watching that gorefest felt like being in a nightmare come to life.
meanings.sent5: The gorefest scene was so vivid, it stayed in my mind for days.

meanings.definition: An event or situation that is excessively bloody or violent.
meanings.sent1: The battle turned into a gorefest with soldiers covered in blood.
meanings.sent2: The crime scene was a gorefest, with blood spatters everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The food fight at the party escalated into a messy gorefest.
meanings.sent4: The action movie was a gorefest of explosions and chaos.
meanings.sent5: The gorefest of a fight in the movie was intense and realistic.
